title: Holidays & Events: Tanabata (Star Festival) (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Tanabata (Star Festival) subcategory within Holidays & Events. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: We write our wishes in the Star Festival.
cards.romaji: Tanabata ni negaigoto o kaku shukan ga arimasu.
cards.japanese: 七夕に願い事を書く習慣があります。
